formattedAddress: 215 E 77th St, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 215 E 77th St, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text: If I could give this man LESS than zero stars I would. He botched my mother’s surgery and ruined her quality of life. What was meant to help alleviate her back pain turned into Dr. Shen essentially paralyzing my mother in her legs. He did not follow up whatsoever. My mother had blood clots following surgery and he did not follow up. This main is SHAMEFUL and a joke. His office is responsible for botching this surgery and making it worse by clearly neglecting her and her care following the surgery. I would not let this man touch me with a ten foot pole.

originalText.text: Dr Shen is godsend I have been in pain for a few years but since my procedure I am free from any pain.  Thank god I found Dr Shen he truly cares about his patients and is a master at his craft. Don’t hesitate to trust this Dr with any of your back issues.

text.text: Dr Shen is godsend I have been in pain for a few years but since my procedure I am free from any pain.  Thank god I found Dr Shen he truly cares about his patients and is a master at his craft. Don’t hesitate to trust this Dr with any of your back issues.

originalText.text: I lived with constant pain for the last 6 plus years. They discovered I had spinal stenosis among other issues in my spine which was causing severe neck pain and constant headaches and numbness in my arms and legs. I had many neurosurgeons tell me there was nothing they could do. Dr Shen reviewed my MRI and said he could definitely help. I had surgery in July and my life has changed. Everyone at his office, including Dr Shen was incredible. It was a pleasure working with them and I'm so happy for all the help they gave me. Definitely will be recommending him to others.

originalText.text: Dr. Shen took a surgery that most surgeons said I couldn't have done without a 6-12 month recovery and turned it into a 6 week recovery with his minimally invasive methods. He is also kind and explains everything thoroughly to you.

text.text: Dr. Shen took a surgery that most surgeons said I couldn't have done without a 6-12 month recovery and turned it into a 6 week recovery with his minimally invasive methods. He is also kind and explains everything thoroughly to you.

originalText.text: Dr. Shen is a compassionate doctor who cares about every single patient he sees. He remembered everything about my case without a x ray or paperwork in front of him when I had questions. I successfully got two separate back surgeries this past summer. My pain in my upper back, that plagued me for years, is completely gone where I had cervical stenosis. My fusion on my lower spine is well on its way to healing fully.  I vetted four different top surgeons in NYC before choosing Dr. Shen and I’m very happy with my choice. Don’t let old school surgeons tell you that endoscopic is not the way. They are just trying to get patients without learning the new technology. Dr. Shen called me every day after my surgery for about two weeks to see how I was doing and it meant a lot to me.
